page.title: 11Agriculture
page.content: Some fields have been joined to ease machinery working with the consequent loss of hedgerows.But generally this has not,so far,spoilt the traditional appearance of the countryside.Modern large farm buildings for crop storage and machinery are general and few isolated farm cottages remain.Grant aid has persuaded land owners and farmers to improve efficiency and output by{underdraining}and{access {road}construction.Livestock is still kept on a few farms,mainly{store {cattle}and some{sheep.}Few{poultry}or {pigs}are kept.Horses and ponies are kept by a few families for riding.But there is only one riding school.A few cottages and farms in village areas and on the busiest roads offer flowers and produce for sale according to the season.The total number of farms using the land in the block is 19.
